question: How many peripheral devices can a master Bluetooth device communicate with in a piconet?
The IDE interface is usually installed on the motherboard in which of the following?
The North Bridge controls the processor, memory, PCI Bus, Level 2 cache and all AGP activities.
If a new hard drive is installed in an old computer and the system does not register the total capacity of the hard drive, what is the most likely cause?
choices: a. The hard drive is malfunctioning
b. The hard drive is not read correctly by the BIOS.
c. The hard drive is not compatible with the computer.
d. The computer motherboard is damaged.

What anti-virus software updates are called.

IDE drives use a __________________.

What should be done if a second hard disk drive is not being recognized by a computer system after finding that all the cable connections are in place?
choices: a. Check to see if the volumes or logical drives have been formatted
b. Check to see if the hard disk drive has been formatted
d. Check to see if the second hard drive is detected by the BIOS

question: A laptop should be used on a soft surface to prevent overheating.

If USB ports are not working with any USB devices, which should you do first?
choices: a. Test the USB devices by connecting them to a different computer
b. Look at the BIOS to confirm that USB functionality is enabled.

question: A  __________________ can cause a computer to reboot.
The best way to secure a network from crackers is ____________________________.
choices: b. Broadcast the SSID in cleartext
c. Use WI-FI protected access technology

question: The output from a power supply is rated as ____________________.
The amount of time that RAM takes to write data or to read it once a request has been received from the processor is called ____________________.
A CD-ROM has data encoded in a spiral track __________________.
choices: a. Beginning at the outermost edge and ending at the center
b. Beginning at the center and ending at the outermost edge

question: Which type of PC Card slot can take all PC Card types?

Most computers today use either a DDR or DDR2 type of memory for their main system memory.
If a computer with Windows XP will not boot up property after upgrading a video driver you should first ________________?
choices: a. Use the Last Known Good Configuration feature
b. Roll Back the driver after starting in Safe Mode
c. Use the Recovery Console feature

question: What most likely explains a keyboard not working properly, after upgrading the memory, where the touchpad is working?
choices: b. The RAM is not installed properly.
c. The RAM is not compatible.
d. The keyboard connector is not seated properly.
